info.name: Kissmanga Layout
info.description: This makes the navbar less contrasting, and fix the image as it's inherit size so it can be responsive.
info.additionalInfo:
KissAnime has anti adblock measures "under maintenance," so you'll need to follow these steps to fix it:
https://www.reddit.com/r/KissAnime/comments/969svs/simple_adblock_methods/

If you are still blocked, then try changing your user agent with user agent switcher extension.
https://duckduckgo.com/?q=user-agent+switcher+extension
